mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cox, Jacob Dolson to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Cox, Jacob Dolson
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling July 1862. By Telegraph from Flat Top 1862. the request that Maj Halls resignation been accepted has been sent to the Head quarters army of Va it will be doubley complied with JD Cox Brig Genl Comdg 25D80pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cox, Jacob Dolson
Flat Top, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
